message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $100 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about $140?
Alice, $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $120, but I can't go any higher. Let me know if that works for you.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I've already come down from $180 to $140 and now to $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $140. How about $132?
